mapper.select: select o.genus, o.species, o.common_name, o.organism_id as ID, op.value as taxonID from organism o, organismprop op, cvterm c where op.type_id = c.cvterm_id and c.name = 'taxonId' and o.organism_id = op.organism_id order by o.common_name

select o.genus, o.species, o.common_name, o.organism_id as ID, op.value as taxonID from organism o, organismprop op, cvterm c where op.type_id = c.cvterm_id and c.name = 'taxonId' and o.organism_id = op.organism_id and o.organism_id = #{ID}

select o.genus, o.species, o.common_name, o.organism_id as ID, op.value as taxonID from organism o, organismprop op, cvterm c where op.type_id = c.cvterm_id and c.name = 'taxonId' and o.organism_id = op.organism_id and op.value = #{taxonID}

select o.genus, o.species, o.common_name, o.organism_id as ID, op.value as taxonID from organism o, organismprop op, cvterm c where op.type_id = c.cvterm_id and c.name = 'taxonId' and o.organism_id = op.organism_id and o.common_name = #{commonName}
